title: Here after foloweth a litel boke called Colyn Cloute compyled by mayster Skelton poete Laureate..
author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.
publisher: by [R. Copland for] me Rycharde Kele dwellyng in the powltry at the long shop vnder saynt Myldredes. chyrche.,
notes: Publisher's name and address from colophon; actual printer's name and conjectured publication date from STC.
D7 contains a portrait of Skelton; the last leaf is blank.
Reproductions of the originals in: British Library (reel 19:18) and Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 2355:4).
